alert.note: Alert for Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:19AM CDT until June 10 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MCPHERSON...NORTHEASTERN RICE AND SOUTHEASTERN ELLSWORTH COUNTIES... At 119 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Windom, or 11 miles west of Mcpherson, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Little River, Geneseo, Lorraine, Windom, Frederick and Kanopolis Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
